* Bio & Contact Info

David Cooper
============

![d.cooper](https://www.wolfforthtx.us/revize_photo_gallery/Government/d.cooper.jpeg)  
  
**Email Contact:**  [dcooper@wolfforthtx.us](mailto:dcooper@wolfforthtx.us)  
**Term:** May 2024-May 2026  
  
****Bio:****

David grew up in the small town of Elk Grove, CA with a population about 7000 people.  David graduated from Elk Grove HS and completed two years in aviation electrician school in the US Navy.  David started his own business, Lights in the Night Neon, in 1983.  In 2009, David sold it and retired, moving to Texas and eventually making his way to Wolfforth.    Once in Wolfforth, David started Glass Arts Glass Studio where he works as a glass artist in casting, blowing, and fusing. David served for the 1*st* time as a City Councilman from 2014-2020.  Currently he is serving as City Councilman, elected in 2022, to continue to support Wolfforth and the citizens of this town.
